meanings.definition: The quality of being malicious or mean-spirited.
meanings.sent1: Her spitefulness towards her classmates made them feel sad.
meanings.sent2: His spitefulness towards his brother caused a lot of arguments.
meanings.sent3: The cat's spitefulness towards the dog led to a playful chase around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The dark cloud of spitefulness hung over their relationship, poisoning every interaction.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's spitefulness towards the students created a tense atmosphere in the classroom.

meanings.definition: A feeling of ill will or resentment.
meanings.sent1: The spitefulness in her voice was evident as she spoke about her ex.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't hide his spitefulness towards his former boss.
meanings.sent3: Despite their spitefulness towards each other, they managed to work together on the project.
meanings.sent4: The spitefulness in the air was palpable, causing tension among the group.
meanings.sent5: The deep-rooted spitefulness between the two families dated back generations.
